item.title: How I Quit My Job and Traveled for Four Months
Motivation to Write
item.description: Motivation to write Started writing on May 10, 2024. For many years I enjoyed reading blogs, but never thought of writing one myself. I found the fact that the content becomes obsolete and stuff I write won’t be true anymore (or people will disagree with them) scary. But here I am today, in the VS Code typing in the first lines of what I am hoping will help me clear my head and form my thoughts better.
